name: FujiLand
description:
Here you can be fighter with many types of weapons or find your way to use magic . then go in your adventure in this big world full of monsters .


FujiLand
Is a mobile action rpg game coming in 2022 but you can try it now.
New parts from the map and items will be added soon
My goal while making this game was to make a game that give you the feeling of an anime adventure and good combat and finally to make it optimized so any one can play it and here we are .The game still in development but it's planed for it to be released later this year.
